response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This figure strikes a balance between reflecting the true worth of the product and offering you an attractive deal. Should you be interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the details. Looking forward to potentially working together.", "product_price": 12000}
